description.p: Possessed of great speed, you can {{rules|move faster than perceptible}}.
You may blink up to {{rules|}} in a direction of your choosing.
Your blink can only take you to destinations you could reach via normal means in the same number of turns as your blink range.
While {{coldsteel|Cold Steel}} is active, blinking through a hostile creature teleports you behind them and makes a free attack, dealing additional {{m|unblockable}} damage
You were turned to the darkness and lost part of your ear in a battle, that's why it's missing.
While {{coldsteel|Cold Steel}} is active, blinking through a hostile creature teleports you behind them and makes a free attack.
Hitting with this attack deals an additional {{rules|}} {{coldsteel|Cold Steel}} damage which cannot be blocked.
Killing an enemy with your {{coldsteel|Cold Steel}} damage keeps your {{rules|Blink}} off its cooldown.
